title: Macabre - An Art Collection to Make Your Hair Stand on End - The Best of 2013
description: A selection of dark style art that has been featured in Macabre Art Magazine in 2013. Includes work from over twenty-five artists and Diego Marcial Rios, Joe Mays, Caitlyn Shea, Todd Petersen, Juan Ramiro Torres, Mary McVicker, Donna Abbate, Lora Mercado, Frederique Boulay, Christopher Rehner, Marc Henderson, Nick Biancardi, Robert Willmore, Carol Estes, Lester Blum, Matt Hester, Jeff Martin, Dennis McCabe, Alma Peralta, Robert Treece, Adam Gillespie, Brian Matheny, Camilla Beenaux, Martin DelCarpio, Christina Efkarpides, Matthew Thompson, Nicky Page, and Piper Robbins*ALSO AVAILABLE IN PAPERBACKCover Photo Christopher Rehner
author: L. Mercado
